solution_line_template: He's inviting {num_people} people over and needs {meat_per_person} pound of meat for each so that's {num_people}*{meat_per_person} = <<{num_people}*{meat_per_person}={total_meat_pounds}>>{total_meat_pounds} pounds of meat

The beef tenderloin is ${cost_per_pound} a pound and he needs {total_meat_pounds} pounds so that's {cost_per_pound}*{total_meat_pounds} = $<<{cost_per_pound}*{total_meat_pounds}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} for dinner
